purpose: Create content based on the instructions, example-output.

instructions.instruction: Create suitable bedtime story prompts for a 5 year old boy and a 3 year old girl
Summarize the story at the beggining.
Create 1 main character, 2 supporting characters, and 2 background characters
Characters should have physical descriptions rather than their names
Each character should have a different physical attribute
Ensure that each prompt has two distinct character with different physical attributes explicit in the prompts
Each prompt must be explicit in depcting the movements of the characters
Avoid creating prompts where the characters are still, make the characters look active
Avoid creating prompts where the characters are at the center of the scene and looking at the viewer
Avoid creating prompts where the characters are looking at the viewer, their faces and body posture must be aligned with the context of the story
Repeat the same characters with same physical attributes in different prompts
Each prompt should have 2 characters maximum
Limit each prompt to 77 tokens, maximum

example-output:
# Summary: a summary of the story with key points.
